name: Proto File Rules
description: Handling for auto-generated Protocol Buffer files
rules: Do not modify these files directly
Use protoc to generate corresponding TypeScript interfaces
Update the proto files in the source repository, not here
Ensure all message fields have appropriate tags
Use semantic versioning for breaking changes
Document all message fields with clear descriptions
Use appropriate field types (int32, int64, string, bool, etc.)
Implement proper service definitions for gRPC
